title: Sure, here's a list of 20 articles on end-to-end speech translation up to 2021. These articles cover various aspects of the field, including methodologies, advancements, and applications
**"End-to-End Speech Translation without Speech Recognition"**
**"Jointly Learning to Align and Translate with Transformer Models"**
publisher: Minh-Thang Luong, Eugene Brevdo, Rui Zhao

title: **"Direct Speech-to-Text Translation with a Sequence-to-Sequence Model"**
note: Weiss, Jan Chorowski, Navdeep Jaitly, Yonghui Wu, Zhifeng Chen, 2017.

title: **"Speech-Transformer: A No-Recurrence Sequence-to-Sequence Model for Speech Recognition"** - Linhao Dong
**"A Comparative Study on End-to-End Speech to Text Translation"** - Anastasios Mouzakitis
**"Espresso: A Fast End-to-End Neural Speech Translation Toolkit"**
note: Shinji Watanabe, Takaaki Hori, Jonathan Le Roux, John R. Hershey, 2018.

title: **"Improving End-to-End Speech-to-Text Translation with Pre-Training"**
**"A Study of End-to-End Speech-to-Text Translation: From Supervised to Semi-Supervised Learning"**
publisher: Matthias Sperber, Graham Neubig, Jan Niehues, Alex Waibel

title: **"Self-Supervised Learning for End-to-End Speech Translation"** - Alexei Baevski
**"End-to-End Speech Translation with Transducer Models"**
note: Shinji Watanabe, Takaaki Hori, Jonathan Le Roux, John R. Hershey, 2019.

title: **"End-to-End Speech Translation with Pre-trained Models"** - Changhan Wang, Anne Wu
**"End-to-End Speech Translation with Knowledge Distillation"** - Changhan Wang, Anne Wu
**"End-to-End Speech Translation with Convolutional Neural Networks"**
note: Weiss, Jan Chorowski, Navdeep Jaitly, Yonghui Wu, Zhifeng Chen, 2017.

title: **"End-to-End Speech Translation with Transformer Models"**
publisher: Matthias Sperber, Graham Neubig, Jan Niehues, Alex Waibel

title: **"End-to-End Speech Translation with Attention Mechanisms"**
note: Shinji Watanabe, Takaaki Hori, Jonathan Le Roux, John R. Hershey, 2018.

title: **"End-to-End Speech Translation with Recurrent Neural Networks"**
note: Weiss, Jan Chorowski, Navdeep Jaitly, Yonghui Wu, Zhifeng Chen, 2017.

title: **"End-to-End Speech Translation with Deep Learning"**
**"End-to-End Speech Translation with Neural Networks"**
note: Shinji Watanabe, Takaaki Hori, Jonathan Le Roux, John R. Hershey, 2018.

title: **"End-to-End Speech Translation with Sequence-to-Sequence Models"**
note: Weiss, Jan Chorowski, Navdeep Jaitly, Yonghui Wu, Zhifeng Chen, 2017.

title: **"End-to-End Speech Translation with Machine Learning"**
